results.title: Simvastatin improves the sexual health-related quality of life in men aged 40 years and over with erectile dysfunction: additional data from the erectile dysfunction and statin trial
results.text_hl: We report on the factor structure of @<m>DISEASE_Osteochondrodysplasias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010009 @@@MED-@@@QoL, the internal reliability of the scale and the derived subscales, and the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @GENE_COL9A3 @GENE_1299 @@@MED@@@-QoL subscales.

citations.NLM: Trivedi D, Wellsted DM, Collard JB, Kirby M. Simvastatin improves the sexual health-related quality of life in men aged 40 years and over with erectile dysfunction: additional data from the erectile dysfunction and statin trial BMC Urol. 2014 Mar 5;14():24. PMID: 24593269
